mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_BOOK_BACKUP (BACKUP_ID, BOOK_ID, BOOK_NAME, ORIGIN_PRICE) VALUES (TEST_BOOK_BACKUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{originPrice})

INSERT ALL
INTO TEST_BOOK_BACKUP (BACKUP_ID, BOOK_ID, BOOK_NAME, ORIGIN_PRICE) VALUES ( TEST_BOOK_BACKUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{book.id}, #{book.name}, #{book.originPrice} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
